name: Fox Craft
description:
Craft your very own fox and explore snow covered forests, caves, and mountains! Hunt animals, recruit friendly foxes to your pack, and face off against fierce bosses! Collect materials to build customizations for your fox including new fur colors, helmets, jetpacks, magic auras and much more!

Download Fox Craft at the very special 50% OFF sale price!

INCREDIBLE FEATURES

CRAFT YOUR FOX
Collect crafting materials from defeated animals and hidden treasure chests! Build excellent armor and accessories to Mix and Match on your fox for a one-of-a-kind look! Jetpack and a Lion’s Mane? Sure! Sparkle Aura, Tiara, and Butterfly Wings? Whatever you want!

LIVE AS YOUR FOX
Life is hard on a wild fox. Finding food and water while staying safe is no easy task. You will have to keep yourself fed and hydrated or risk the death of your fox!

HUNT YOUR PREY
Sprint through an incredibly large open-world forest inhabited by delicious animal and fierce predators. Hunt and fight for your life to keep your pack well fed and happy! Raid the farmer’s animal pens for easy prey!

BATTLE BOSSES
Try your luck against fearsome bosses like Spiketail and Croczilla! They are not your average enemies so be brave and fight with all your might!

BUILD YOUR FOX FAMILY
Recruit a family of foxes to fight by your side and help you defeat even the most difficult of opponents! Watch them grow in size and strength as your pack fights for dominance of the Animal Kingdom.

LEVEL UP YOUR FOX
Gain experience and earn level-ups which will increase the strength and speed of your fox!

EXPLORE THE WILDERNESS
Grab fish from streams, fight wolves on mountain tops, and care for your family in the safety of an underground den. An incredibly large and beautiful world awaits you!

3D ANIMATED VOXEL ANIMALS
Loads of block-style animals with realistic animations bring the wild world of Fox Craft to life! Wolves, foxes, deer, skunks, raccoons, rabbits, bears, snakes, fish, alligators, spiders, bats, cows, pigs, sheep, moose, birds and more are waiting to challenge you!

SIMULATED WEATHER AND ATMOSPHERE
Play all day and through the night and watch as the world changes around you! Twinkling stars and realtime sunsets add realism and beauty to your experience that to our Advanced Weather Simulator!

NO ADS OR IN-APP PURCHASES
Don’t worry about any bothersome ads popping up while your in a fight for your life!

Craft your fox and begin the animal adventure of a lifetime, the most unique animal simulation crafting hybrid game in the world has arrived, Fox Craft!
